text: Hi all can someone please help me, its pretty urgent. i have my site build in a sandbox account and now i need to transfer it to a live account. is there any process i need to follow ? how can i manage that? also is there any way to transfer HubDB from sandbox to live??
Dude.. are you adept to with api calls?
That is gonna be the only way to migrate content
.. you'd have to migrate theme first
